Burning Hammer arrived in the Lower Cargo Room and found the one Zardus sent
him after. He carefully aimed a Sniper Rifle at the bot...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 29, 2000 9:33 AM
Subject: Re: Big, Big Ships


> ::Lambda::
>      "Welll let's see I'm not terriably fast but I have a great deal of
skill in the arts of scouting and espionage.  I am also good with
demolitions.  I don't think my past is terriably important, but if you must
know I grew up off of Cybertron on a ship with my parents and brother.  My
brother died and my parents commited suicide because of my proding.
Immediately there after I comandeered the small ship, which wasn't hard
because I was now alone on it, and spent some time wandering around.  I got
into some crossfire in orbit.  The bigger ships probably never noticed me
there.  I climbed into the one stasis pod on board and the ship was
destroyed.  The next thing I knew I woke up here on this strange planet in a
field of llamas.  Then Burning Hammer came for me and I walked here with
him.
>
>
>
>
